name: MacGourmet Deluxe 4 Recipes
summary: Learn about .MGOURMET4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MacGourmet Deluxe is a recipe management app that allows cooks to import or manually add recipes. Cooks can then organize, annotate, search through, print, or export their recipes.

Cooks can export recipes in many formats, including MacGourmet Deluxe 4's proprietary MGOURMET4 format. Unlike recipes exported in other formats, recipes exported as MGOURMET4 files contain all notes and images added to the recipes. To export one or more recipes as an MGOURMET4 file:
Open MacGourmet and select the recipes you want to export.
From the program's menu bar, select File â†’ Export.
In the export window, select the MacGourmet 4 format.

description: An MGOURMET4 file is a recipe collection exported from Mariner MacGourmet Deluxe 4. It contains one or more meal recipes, as well as images and notes associated with those recipes. MGOURMET 4 files are used to back up or share recipes.

instructions: You can open an MGOURMET4 file with Mariner MacGourmet Deluxe 4 (Mac) or Hindsight Labs Paprika Recipe Manager (Mac, iOS).
